pullrequest.title: Arbitrary subfolders for device code within labscript_devices

content.raw:
Which single-device convention do you prefer?

```
DummyPseudoclock/
    __init__.py
        from .labscript_device import DummyPseudoclock
    labscript_device.py
    blacs_tab.py
    blacs_worker.py
    runviewer_parser.py
    register_classes.py
```

or
```
DummyPseudoclock/
    __init__.py
        from .dummy_pseudoclock import DummyPseudoclock
    dummy_pseudoclock.py
    blacs_tab.py
    blacs_worker.py
    runviewer_parser.py
    register_classes.py
```
    
(or something else)

I'm leaning toward the former.
